rules_text:
When Agatha Chris”Q” enters, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{U}, Sacrifice Agatha Chris”Q”: Scry 2.
flavor_text: [i]“Writing is my specialty. With how much I've seen and read over ten lifetimes, writing detective novels is no problem for me.”[/i]
